name: Defixio
description:
You must adventure through various (yet to be completed) levels of a spooky dungeon, with your trusty spells on hand to defend you from danger. Currently in  pre-alpha. The current builds are missing lots of already created features/gameplay elements but is slightly more stable. Older build has sound effects and music, newer build has part of an enemy ai and UI.

Main Programming - Ponzis

Combat coding - Lihpten

Graphics/Music/Audio - McCheeseBob
